item.description:
Let's help the Meriden Daffodil festival, noon to 3pm

to spin Cotton Candy, they will show you how.

http://www.daffodilfest.com/

We only need a few volunteers.

 

Meriden's Largest and most colorful festival the "Meriden Daffodil Festival" will celebrate it's 34th year during 2012.

PARKING AT HUB DOWNTOWN MERIDEN 88 STATE STREET
West Bound I-691take Exit 7, bear left onto State Street, continue on State Street through stop sign.  Continue about a ¼ of a mile, Festival Parking will be on your left at 88 State Street. If you are using GPS input 88 State Street Meriden CT

PARKING AT PLATT HIGH SCHOOL(220 COE AVE.) & WILCOX TECHNICAL SCHOOL (298 OREGON ROAD)
East Bound I-691take Exit 5, at end of exit take a right onto Chamberlain highway. At 2nd traffic light take right onto West Main Street.  At next traffic light take a left onto Centennial Avenue.  At next traffic light continue straight.  Platt High School (220 Coe Ave.) is on your immediate left. Wilcox Tech (298 Oregon Road is approximately ¼ mile past Platt High School on your left. If you are using GPS input 298 State Street Meriden, CT.
item.name: Meriden Daffodil Festival
